name: Laser Evaders
description:
Download for the best experience!

The Game

Your job as cube overlord is to will the rotation of cubes in order to keep balls from interacting with lasers. If you fail, the sphere you were trying to guide to safety will be vaporizing and you'll have to try again. There are 22 levels and one unlockable ability! Additionally, the game feature one whole sound effect, so be sure to listen close!

Controls

DRAG MOUSE to rotate cube

ESCAPE to pause

MOUSE SCROLL to zoom

SHIFT to use unlockable ability
